dct_title_s: National atlas of the United States of America, 1997-2014
dct_description_sm: "This atlas updates a large bound collection of paper maps that was published in 1970."
System requirements: Flash, QuickTime, and Shockwave plug-ins to access multimedia maps.
Mode of access: Internet from the National Atlas web site. Address as of 7/25/01: http://www.nationalatlas.gov/; current access is available via PURL.

A largely digital resource designed to promote greater geographic awareness through the development and delivery of products that provide easy to use, map-like views of our natural and socio-cultural landscapes.
dct_rights_sm: This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: This work is in the Public Domain, meaning that it is not subject to copyright.
